entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one asking a question. He is described as saying 'said Harry'.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is mentioned as the one responding to Harry's question. She is described as saying 'said Myrtle dramatically'.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is mentioned as someone who upset Myrtle. He is described as causing her distress.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one providing a helpful comment to Myrtle's story. He is described as saying 'said Ron helpfully'.

relationships.description: Harry asked Myrtle a question, which is described as 'Did you see anyone near here that night?'
Peeves caused distress to Myrtle, which is described as 'upset me so much'.
Ron provided a comment to Myrtle's story, which is described as 'said Ron helpfully'.
